articles.author: David Purdum
articles.title: IU grows as title-game fave after semi blowout - ESPN
articles.description: Indiana opened as a 7.5-point favorite over Miami for the College Football Playoff National Championship. The Hoosiers entered the season as around a 150-1 long shot to win the title.
articles.content:
Indiana's blowout of Oregon on Friday caused sportsbooks to significantly adjust the point spread on the College Football Playoff National Championship against Miami.
The Hoosiers opened as a 7.5-po… [+1511 chars]
